overview: Sebastian is CEO of 77 Pieces. He is a film industry veteran with over 15 years of experience as a technology innovator with A-list film studios such as Industrial Light + Magic, Sony Pictures Imageworks and Weta Digital. In 2002 he received an Academy AwardÂ® (Science & Technology) for inventing software that simulates the motion of cloth, musculoskeletal structures, skin and hair for feature film production. Sebastian has made significant contributions to numerous Oscar and Visual Effects Society award winning films, as well as some of the most successful film franchises of all time including Avatar, Spiderman, Pirates of the Caribbean, Terminator, Harry Potter, Star Wars, The Mummy & Jurassic Park.
